entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who has a conversation with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts and a mentor to Harry.

relationships.description: Harry has a conversation with Trelawney, which drives everything else out of his head.
Harry visits Dumbledore's office to discuss something important.
Harry believes he has found a Horcrux, which is a powerful and dangerous object in the wizarding world.
Dumbledore is a mentor to Harry and provides guidance and support.
